sub_title: Senior Business Analyst | DevOPS engineer | Core Banking SME | Payments | Automation Testing|Banking Analytics |Scrum|BPM
summary:
Experienced Senior Business System Analyst with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Business Requirements, Requirements Analysis, Business Process, Business Analysis, and User Acceptance Testing. Strong information technology professional with a Master of Business Administration (M.B.A.) focused in Marketing and Finance from Indian Institute of Planning and Management. 

•	Have overall 14 years’ experience out of which have more than 11 years’ experience in IT possessing comprehensive knowledge of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), having thorough understanding of various phases like Requirements, Analysis/Design, Development, Testing, Implementation and Support.  
•	Nearly 3 years’ experience working in Agile environment and involved in facilitating daily scrum meeting, refinement, sprint retrospective, user story mapping and sprint planning. 
•	Possess experience in client facing role with extensive knowledge in gathering business requirements via feedback sessions and client meetings, in collaboration with all stakeholders. Obtained multi-level signoff on business requirement (BRD) and Solution design (SDD) documents from the client.
•	Facilitated (JAD) Joint Application Development sessions to identify business rules and requirements and then documented them in a format that can be reviewed and understood by both business people and technical people. 
•	Possess functional knowledge of Flexcube core banking modules (Customer, CASA, DE).
•	Possess functional knowledge of Corniche (Core Banking System).
•	Possess functional knowledge of Profile Direct (Core banking suite).
•	Involved in preparing detailed User manual for the application. 
•	Excellent written and verbal communication skills along with excellent presentation skills and a good team player with a flair for problem solving. 
•	Strong personal ownership and commitment to quality. Capable of handling multiple projects in parallel.
•	Pro-active, open and honest attitude in workshops. 
•	Able to produce all required documentation in a timely and accurate manner.

school.name: Indian Institute of Planning and Management

certifications.name: Visual Studio Tools for Azure DevOps

profile_positions.description:
ING Bank
Responsibility
•	Configuration of Legal entity and entity group within CLO based on client needs. 
•	Analysed client existing facility data feed and created mapping document to Datahub facility. 
•	Configuration of credit workflow and facility within CLO based on client needs. 
•	Design and developed Regulatory Assessment model within CLO to create below assessment.
	Forbearance
	Policy Adherence
	Environment & Social Risk
	ECB Leverage Transaction
•	Lead the configuration team and ensuring the below configuration are deployed seamless from development to production.
•	Lead the configuration team in resolving the configuration defects raised during UAT phase.
•	Analysed Pricing API and ING specific pricing application and JavaScript files.
•	Involved in design and building integration of CLO with ING internal pricing system
•	Lead the design and implementation of Cross and Sub facility feature in CLO.
•	Leading the requirement and design development of UAM with in FIS environment based on new way of working.
•	Design and configured rating workflow in CLO and integrated with Optimist for following features with multi-level approval.
	Retrieve financials.
	Create Assessment
	Retrieve rating score card question.
	Retrieve recommended rating.
•	Lead the requirement, design, integration, and development for below listed workflow within CLO and ING eco system.
	Managed By Restructure
	Watchlist
	Non-Performing Loan

ING Bank
Responsibility

	Value Balance
	RRG Batch Processing
	SAM EUR
•	Involved in analyzing day end batch process, scheduler and providing solution for batch restartability.

•	Involved in preparing automation test case using HP ALM and execution of release multi-node release test.
•	Assisting Product Owner as and when required from initial stages of Epic Management - User Story creation, Planning, Defining Acceptance Criteria - to delivery of solutions.
•	Managing alignment between business, blueprint experts, feature engineers, IT integrators and DevOps teams.
•	Design end to end feature and deliver functional design documents.
•	Presenting demo of the solutions to the stakeholders.
•	As part of DevOps team, pick up additional activities like test automation, functional documentation review, triaging production issue.
•	Involved in setting up of Robot Framework automation tool within the department and training the colleagues.

profile_positions.description:
Sainsbury Bank
Responsibility:
•	Involved in product parameterization, customization of Profile Fixed and Variable Savings, ISA and Loans. 
•	Involved in supporting mock migration reconciliation during testing phase and during final migration. 
•	Engaged in client and cross business unit workshops to determine both functional and non-functional business requirements. 
•	Documented detailed solution enhancements in the form of Functional Specifications for business and regulatory / compliance requirements for Savings, Deposit and Loans. 
•	Involved as Profile SME for integration with AML, Fircosoft, I2, Touch Point, Interact, Oracle, Wescot (Collection and Recovery) and Cortex (Debit and ATM cards) channel. 
•	Testing support for processing UK payments (FPS, BACS, CHAPS, Cash / Cheque) in UAT, Joint Migration. 
•	Provided training to the trainers on Profile WebCSR and PD Teller.
•	Lead as primary point of contact for defect / incident triaging and support during the live proving and postproduction phase during the release of Savings, Deposit and Loan module.

Shivalik Bank
Responsibility:
•	Prepared functional specification document and obtained signoff from the client.
•	Prepared product mapping and doing gap analysis.

•	Configuration of Product, Fee plan, Index, General ledger, Transaction Code, User Class, Transaction Limit, ATM Interface.
•	Tested migrated data with new product set up and identifying the defects.   
•	 Enhanced existing Internet banking to meet bank requirement.  
•	Reconciled of General Ledger.

Bharatiya Mahila Bank

Bharatiya Mahila Bank Ltd is the first of its kind in the Banking Industry in India formed with a vision of economic empowerment for women. Bank will be focusing on the entire pyramid of Indian women, special attention will be given to economically neglected, deprived, discriminated, under banked, unbanked, rural and urban women to ensure inclusive and sustainable growth. Profile is selected as the Core banking application along with other application i.e.(Internet Banking, Trade Finance).

•	Implemented clearing module.

profile_positions.description:
Responsibility: 
•	Provided service to customers and prospective customers seeking residential mortgage loans.

•	Validated automated underwriting decision per delegated authority.
